alert.note: Alert for Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:48AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN PIKE AND SOUTHERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 715 AM EDT... At 648 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Chillicothe to near Kincaid Springs, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Waverly, Bainbridge, Pike Lake, Londonderry, Pike County Airport, Omega, Buchanan, Summithill, Richmond Dale, Massieville, Linn, Lake White and Scioto Trail State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
